content.rendered:
Kindergarten | First Grade | Second Grade | Third Grade | Fourth Grade | Fifth Grade

Below you will find a grade-specific list of supplies that will help prepare you for the start of school. Please be sure to label all personal supplies with your student’s name. Materials can be brought to school on the first day.

Kindergarten

Personal Materials

  • 1 pack Low Odor Expo thin Dry Erase Markers (black)
  • 1 pair Children’s scissors
  • 3 Elmer’s Glue Sticks (large)
  • 1 box regular size Crayola Crayons 8 count
  • 3 boxes Crayola Crayons 24 count (Regular Colors)
  • 1 box Classic Crayola Markers (large primary colors – 10 pack)
  • 1 bottle Elmer’s White Glue
  • 1 Plastic pencil box (8″*5″ approximately)
  • Headphones (NO earbuds)

Additional Supplies Needed for Kindergarten

  • Water Bottle
  • Healthy Snack (daily)
  • Sneakers for PE
  • Backpack (no wheels)
  • Art Smock (e.g. old shirt)

First Grade

Personal Materials

  • 1 – Box 24 Count Crayola Crayons
  • 1 – Pack Thin Low Odor Expo Dry Erase Markers (black)
  • 1 – Pair Children’s scissors
  • 4 – Elmer’s Glue Sticks
  • 1 – Large Pink Eraser
  • 1 – Box Classic Crayola Thin Washable Markers
  • Headphones (no earbuds)

Additional Supplies Needed for First Grade

  • Water Bottle
  • Healthy Snack
  • Sneakers for PE
  • Backpack (no wheels)
  • Art Smock (e.g. old shirt)

Second Grade

Personal Materials

  • 1 – Box Crayola Crayons, 24 Count 
  • 1 – Pack – Low Odor Expo Dry Erase Markers (black) 
  • 1 – Plastic Pencil/Supply Box 
  • 1 – Pair Children’s scissors 
  • 5 – Elmer’s Glue Sticks 
  • 1 – Box Washable Crayola Markers 
  • 2 – Large Erasers 
  • 3 – Pocket Folders (Red, Blue, Yellow) 
  • Headphones (no earbuds)

Additional Supplies Needed for Second Grade

  • Water Bottle
  • Healthy Snack
  • Sneakers for PE
  • Backpack (no wheels)
  • Art Smock (e.g. old shirt)

Third Grade

Personal Materials

  • 1 Box – Colored Pencils
  • 1 Box – 24 Pack Crayola Crayons
  • 4 Pack – Low Odor Expo Dry Erase Markers
  • 1 Plastic Pencil/Supply Box
  • 1 Pair – Children’s Scissors
  • 6 Elmer’s Glue Sticks
  • 1 Small Pencil Sharpener
  • 2 Packs – 3*3 Post-It-Notes
  • 2 – Composition Notebooks
  • 2 – Large Erasers
  • 4 – Pocket Folders (Red, Green, Yellow, Blue)
  • Headphones (no earbuds) 

Additional Supplies Needed for Third Grade

  • Water Bottle – spout top only (to prevent spills)
  • Healthy Snack
  • Sneakers for PE
  • Backpack (no wheels)

Fourth Grade

Personal Materials

  • 1 – Box Colored Pencils 12 count
  • 1 – 12 count box of Thin Markers
  • 1 – Pack Low Odor Expo Dry Erase Markers
  • 1 – Pencil/Supply Box
  • 1 – Pair Children’s scissors
  • 2 – Elmer’s Glue Sticks
  • 4 – Plastic Pocket Folders (1 of each color: Green, Blue, Red, Yellow)
  • 1 – 1 Subject Notebook
  • 2 – 3*3 Post-it-notes
  • 1 – pair of Headphones (no earbuds)

Additional Supplies Needed for Fourth Grade

  • Water Bottle
  • Healthy Snack
  • Sneakers for PE
  • Backpack (no wheels)

Fifth Grade

Personal Materials

  • 1 Box Colored Pencils
  • 1 Pack Low Oder Exp Dry Erase markers (black) with Eraser Caps
  • 1 Pencil/Soft Sided Supply Pouch (labeled with name)
  • 1 Pair Children Scissors
  • 2 Elmer’s Glue Sticks
  • 3 (Two-Pocket) Folders in different colors (labeled with name)
  • 4 One-Subject Notebooks (labeled with name)
  • Small Pencil Sharpener
  • Headphones with a cord (no earbuds)

ORCHESTRA STUDENTS:  1” Binder with Pockets (Lesson book will go in the pocket. Orchestra students can use 4th-grade binder). Please put your child’s name on the binder.
